Yikes. Let me answer my own question. It seems that the information 
has been updated.

The new date appears to be April 30, 2005 as opposed to Jan 15.

There is now a preview option available on the Amazon listing as well 
at http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-
